description: The source of a media object. An instance of a scene media source.
title: SceneMediaSourceConfig

___tile.description: The size of a tile, in case the chosen format is cube. The size corresponds to the width and the height of a face.
___tile.title: Tile

___order.description:
Order of the layout in the cubemap media, ie where are the faces in the media, starting from the top left of the media. Needs to be a 6-char string, constitued with all of the following letter:
  • R for Right
  • L for Left
  • U for Up
  • D for Down
  • B for Back
  • F for Front
___order.title: Order

___format.description:
The format of the media: equi is for an equirectangular resource (the most common one) and cube is for a cubemap resource (less common but more efficient to display). Can be :
  • equi
  • cube
  • flat
  • hotspot
___format.title: Format

___url.description: This property is only set when the media is an image. The file can be local or on a distant server, but must be a valid image format.
___url.title: URL

___levels.description: This property is only set when the media is a video. The files can be local or on a distant server, but must be a valid video format. If the array is composed of multiple URLs, it is considered that there are multiple qualities to consider. Each member is an instance of a scene source level.
___levels.title: Levels

$eref.description: The level of a media source object. An instance of a scene source level.
$eref.title: SceneMediaLevelConfig

___name.description: If set, specifies the {level} pattern for this level. If not, the value will be the index of the level in the levels array.
___name.title: Name

___tile.description: The size of a tile, which corresponds to the width and the height of a tile. It will be used with the width and height to compute the value of the {x} and {y} patterns.
___tile.title: Tile

___url.description: If set, overrides any computed URL by this one. If not, the URL will be computed from other values
___url.title: URL

___height.description: The height of the source. It will be used with the width and tile to compute the value of the {x} and {y} patterns.
___height.title: Height

___width.description: The width of the source. It will be used with the height and tile to compute the value of the {x} and {y} patterns.
___width.title: Width

___pattern.description:
The pattern to respect in case of a multi tiles media. Four parameters are authorized:
  • {face} is for the face, in case of a cubemap media
  • {level} is for the level of quality of the tile, in case of a multi resolution media
  • {x} if for the x coordinates of the tile
  • {y} if for the y coordinates of the tile
___pattern.title: Pattern

___streaming.description:
The streaming method: either a html5 video (usually .mp4 or .webm), or a dash flux (.mpd). The authorized values are :
  • html5
  • dash
___streaming.title: Streaming

$eref.description: The field of view of a media object. An instance of a scene media fov object.
$eref.title: SceneMediaFovConfig

___vertical.description: The vertical field of view of the media.
___vertical.title: Vertical field of view

___diagonal.description: The diagonal field of view of the media.
___diagonal.title: Diagonal field of view

___horizontal.description: The horizontal field of view of the media.
___horizontal.title: Horizontal field of view
